data: Tian was blessed (though few farmers would have used such a word) with three patches: River Field, where his family had grown rice since time out of mind; Roadside Field, where ka-Jaffords had grown sharproot, pumpkin, and corn for those same long years and generations; and Son of a Bitch, a thankless tract which Tian wasn’t the first Jaffords determined to make something of the twenty acres behind the home place; his Gran-père, perfectly sane in most other respects, had been convinced there was gold there.
River Field | Roadside Field | Son of a Bitch
River Field | Roadside Field | Son of a Bitch | home place

Tian was blessed (though few farmers would have used such a word) with three patches: River Field, where his family had grown rice since time out of mind; Roadside Field, where ka-Jaffords had grown sharproot, pumpkin, and corn for those same long years and generations; and Son of a Bitch, a thankless tract which Tian wasn't the first Jaffords determined to make something of the twenty acres behind the home place; his Gran-père, perfectly sane in most other respects, had been convinced there was gold there.
